entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
